description:
Redtail Paddles, based in Ontario, is famous as a quality paddle maker. This beavertail paddle is great for option for stern paddling. The white ash shaft keeps weight down, and the eye-catching cherry wood blade has two walnut inserts for added strength and beauty.

  • Laminated white ash shaft with a cherry wood blade
  • Two black maple strips
  • Curved euro grip prevents wrist and arm fatigue
  • Resin tip adds strength and protection
name: Redtail Beavertail 7" Canoe Paddle
